column4: Have Ubuntu maverick 64 bit on a machine with 4 GB of RAM. On a fresh install there was 3.9GB listed and some days ago it went down to 3.7. Where did the ram go?
Have Ubuntu maverick 64 bit on a machine with 4 GB of RAM. On a fresh install there was 3.9GB listed and some days ago it went down to 3.7. Where did the ram go?
